normalized: while looking back at shion surroundedby the dolls, infinity headed towards me with indifference in his steps.

name: infinity
normalized: i will get rid of him.

name: infinity
normalized: nee-san's emotions are notneeded concerning dolls.
her emotions will bedestroyed and new memories implanted
i called out to shion over the doll'sshoulder that imitated the look of a boy.

name: hiroki
normalized: i mean, shion's brother is here witha guy he can't even hate, but….

name: infinity
normalized: you'd better say your farewells whileyou still have time
despite infinity referring to her as nee-san,the fact is, he didn't give a damn about shion,she was at fault from the way he spoke….

name: hiroki
normalized: this has nothing to do with being a dollor a geist….

name: infinity
normalized: what can you do with an immobile body?
maybe the beast can snarl at me?
twisting her body furiously,shion untied herself from the dolls' arms.
she then broke off into a run towards us.

name: shion
normalized: i won't let you kill hiroki,if you insist, then….
stopping his gait in a leisurely manner,infinity looked back at shion looking ratherannoyed.
shion had stopped suddenly in place likea suspension button had been pressed.

name: hiroki
normalized: infinity, what did you do to shion!?

name: infinity
normalized: the snake geist is wise, huh
infinity nodded like he was impressedby mrs.

name: infinity
normalized: it was my master's intent to bestow mewith a way of communicating to my sisterssent to the many dimensions

name: infinity
normalized: there is no doll able to defy my words.
shion could not move her arms, legs, or her gaping mouth.
it was in accordance to his "freeze" command.
shion was absent of free will.
tears began welling up in her opened eyes.
even though they spilled over and fell downher cheeks, shion could not even wipe them away.
putting even more strength into my bloodyarms and legs, i writhed recklessly in anattempt to escape from my predicament.

name: infinity
normalized: no matter how much you struggle, you'll only worsen your wounds.
because, even if you're not flustered,i'm going to make you relax right now….
lifting up his enormous gun with ease,infinity pressed the point beneath my chin.
but, that didn't stop me from struggling.

name: infinity
normalized: if i shoot you here, your head will go into verysmall pieces.
that would be impossible to regenerate from, even for a wolf geist

name: infinity
normalized: good-bye, wolf geist…be still, since it will be over quick
i responded with a sharp look and ascornful smile.

name: hiroki
normalized: i…am going to finish this quickly too…!
i could no longer feel the pain.
an unpleasant feeling at the endsof my arms and legs.
leaving the tops of my feet and the ends of mywrists in the wall, i escaped from infinity'sstakes.
as i heard shion's delicate voice,my entire body blazed up in a bluish-white flame.

name: infinity
normalized: you tore away your hands andfeet and regenerated them as you turnedinto a geist….

name: hiroki
normalized: a doll cannot be risky, right…?
i had just managed to remain conscious.
i hadn't been consumed by the wolf geist yet.
i wanted to tear through the unpleasantsight of this doll….

name: infinity
normalized: i'm glad i was able to meet you, since i can show youhow i was made to fight the likes of you…!

name: hiroki
normalized: do you really have the leisure to be blabbering?
my claws cut through the air and struckright under the length of his gun.
while gazing at the sparks flying from infinity'ssole weapon as he tried to hastily get away,i closed the distance, leaping savagely at him.
i overtook infinity and drove into his chest.
his second weapon, the lilium, had been destroyed now.

name: hiroki
normalized: you're no match for me in melee…!
i swung my sharpened claws down at thecrown of infinity's head.
my ears perceived shion's shriekresounding around me.

name: infinity
normalized: i don't intend on contendingwith your strength
just before my wolf claws reached him,infinity grinned broadly.
i had carelessly swung my arms at him.
five claws aiming to shred that handsome face.
…that was what supposed to have happened.
my claws had swiped through the open air.

name: infinity
normalized: they look like shion's, don't they?

name: infinity
normalized: you are no match for me in melee, wouldn'tyou say?
infinity's light blade had gone into myshoulder and pierced out from my chest.

name: infinity
normalized: this "aloof" child is a failure and toosoft.
this data won't be very useful

name: infinity
normalized: i'll make sure she's properly retuned.
after this, she too will be an admirable doll that will keep hunting geists for us
my eyesight left me as did the strengthin my legs.
my body crumpled onto the ground.
i heard shion's scream far in the distance.
i didn't make out what mrs.
it was as if i was losing my hearing.
it wasn't just my five senses, but myconsciousness that became heavy and dull,like it were trying to stop all together.

name: infinity
normalized: i felt you did good in changing yourappearance, wolf geist…no, hiroki asaki-kun
despite it being my final moments,i found that listening to infinity's voiceannoyed me greatly.
i wanted to hear shion's voice, and yet…

name: infinity
normalized: --no, was the wolf geist's potentialoverestimated, i wonder?
while considering such things,i sensed the end closing in on me.
